description:
We are an import and distribution company in Downtown Los Angeles. We are currently seeking an experienced in house bookkeeper to manage all our books, keeping monthly financials current and live. The ideal candidate will become part of the team and work closely with the owner.

Requirements:

High School diploma and AA Degree or higher in Accounting or Business recommended

2+ years of relevant experience in bookkeeping

Proficiency data entry skills with a knack for numbers

Good understanding of Microsoft Excel and background working with Excel Formulas

Must be well organized

Key responsibilities:

Processing accounts payable and account receivable: handling collection as needed.

Carefully filing documents and preserve historical records

Reconciling bank and general ledgers

Processing weekly payroll at the ADP portal

Entering all the accounts receivable and payable data into Quickbooks

Handling monthly, quarter and year end close, accurately and on time
